value:
$WmMPID_タニス,ch09_12_Tanis_F_Normal,Face|Are you tired already? The tip of
your lance is sagging, girl. What
are you going to do, stab my foot?$k$p$WmMPID_マーシャ,ch09_25_Masha_F_Normal,Face|Yes, ma'am! I mean—no, ma'am!
Hiyah!$k$p$WmMPID_タニス,ch09_12_Tanis_F_Normal,Face|Pathetic! With stamina like that, you'd
never survive a real battle! I'm adding
200 push-ups to your regimen.$k$pThe Holy Guard does not tolerate
weaklings. And don't think you can
get out of this with a letter again!$k$p$WmMPID_マーシャ,ch09_25_Masha_F_Normal,Face|Eeek! Yes, D-Deputy Commander!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Wow. Tanith sure is passionate
about getting Marcia into fighting
form, isn't she?$k$p$WmMPID_ステラ,ch09_26_Stella_F_Normal,Face|Even among the Begnion Holy Guard,
Lady Tanith is extraordinarily capable.
Few pegasus knights are her equal.$k$pAs deputy commander, the burden
of protecting Empress Sanaki must
weigh heavily on her shoulders.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Oh, you mean the Holy Guard that
Sigrun commands? They're really
nice!$k$p$WmMPID_ステラ,ch09_26_Stella_F_Normal,Face|The very same. Though they are far
from Begnion, it is clear that the
Holy Guard remain ever vigilant.$k$pTheir sense of duty is admirable.
I'm sure I could learn a thing or
two from such dedication.$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_マーシャ,ch09_25_Masha_F_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|Oh, crackers... I thought that torture
would never end...$k$pCan my luck get any worse? Even
after getting summoned to a whole
other world, nothing's changed.$k$pSeriously, how am I STILL getting
hounded by the deputy commander?
How the heck is that fair?!$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face_Smile|Great work today, Marcia!$k$p$WmMPID_マーシャ,ch09_25_Masha_F_Normal,Face|Oh, Princess Sharena and Astrid!
You...didn't see all that earlier, right?
That would be way too embarrassing.$k$p$WmMPID_ステラ,ch09_26_Stella_F_Normal,Face|Not at all. I dare say you held up
quite well, given what I've heard
about Lady Tanith's training regimen.$k$pI see the Holy Guard's reputation
is well-deserved. It makes me want
to train even harder!$k$p$WmMPID_マーシャ,ch09_25_Masha_F_Normal,Face|Ha... I've only got 147 push-ups left.
You can get started on that training
right now by taking over for me.$k$pWhew! I'm tuckered out.$k$p$WmMPID_シャロン,ch00_02_Sharon_F_Normal,Face|Hmm... Oh, how about this? Alfonse
mentioned needing to take care of
some bandits the other day.$k$pWhy don't we handle it for him?
It'd be helping the Order, and
helping us train!$k$p$WmMPID_マーシャ,ch09_25_Masha_F_Normal,Face|Sure, whatever. I'm about to pass
out here...$k$pDrop by the barracks when you
need me, but fair warning: I'll be
counting sheep for a while.$k$p$WmMPID_ステラ,ch09_26_Stella_F_Normal,Face|I'm not ready to turn in just yet, but
I'll see you two later. Take care!$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_ステラ,ch09_26_Stella_F_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|...I may be a knight, but without any
real experience, is it really right to
call myself one?$k$pI'll have to train twice as hard as
Marcia to even have a hope of
making up for lost time!$k$pWait, what's this on the ground?
Did somebody drop it?$k$pIt's some kind of notebook... But
who could it belong to?$k$p$Fo1500,0,0,0,255|$WmMPID_タニス,ch09_12_Tanis_F_Normal,Face|$Fi1500|Now then, time to... What the—?!
Where did my notebook go? I know
I had it this morning!$k$pI must have dropped it, but where?
If that notebook falls into the wrong
hands... Goddess help me.$k$p
